title: MBMBaM 534: The Hang-in-There Burger
description:
We’ve all been through the wringer these past couple of weeks, but don’t worry! We have a burger, now, that’s gonna fix EVERYTHING. Take a bite, savor its complex flavor profile, and allow its powerful beef juices to do their thing.

Suggested talking points: Concessions, Waxy Sex Tongs, Waterbed Secrets, Jacket Half-Theft, What’s the Cups, Chainsaw Surprise

Ways to support Black Lives Matter and find anti-racism resources: https://linktr.ee/blacklivesmatter
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
